news.title: Netflix backs out of bid for Warner Bros. Discovery, giving studios, HBO, and CNN to Ellison-owned Paramount
news.summary: In a one-two punch of centibillion-dollar offers, the bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery is over. David Ellison-owned Paramount will acquire Warner Bros. Discovery. Netflix has lost.

news.title: Jack Dorsey just halved the size of Block’s employee base — and he says your company is next
news.summary: Jack Dorsey has long been an open admirer of Elon Musk. Now, it seems, he may have been taking notes.

news.title: Anthropic CEO stands firm as Pentagon deadline looms
news.summary: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday that he "cannot in good conscience accede" to the Pentagon's demands to give the military unrestricted access to its AI systems.

news.title: PayPal might not be looking to sell itself: Report
news.summary: PayPal may not be in talks to be acquired, sources have told Semafor, after a previous news report that Stripe was sniffing around.

news.title: Google paid startup Form Energy $1B for its massive 100-hour battery
news.summary: The deal paves the way for Form Energy to raise a new funding round before potentially going public next year.

news.title: Anthropic refuses Pentagon’s new terms, standing firm on lethal autonomous weapons and mass surveillance
news.summary: Less than 24 hours before the deadline in an ultimatum issued by the Pentagon, Anthropic has refused the Department of Defense's demands for unrestricted access to its AI. news.title: Netflix walks away from its deal to buy Warner Bros. after Paramount came back with a better offer
news.summary: Netflix has dropped its $83 billion deal to acquire the Warner Bros. studio, HBO, and its streaming service HBO Max. news.title: Microsoft’s Copilot Tasks AI uses its own computer to get things done
news.summary: Microsoft is previewing a new AI system, Copilot Tasks, that it says is designed to take care of busywork for you in the background, the company announced on Thursday. news.title: Jack Dorsey’s Block cuts nearly half of its staff in AI gamble
news.summary: Jack Dorsey's Block, the financial tech company that runs Square and the Cash app, is cutting its workforce by "nearly half" and axing more than 4,000 jobs. news.summary: Lenovo's next gaming laptop could be a shapeshifting foldable called the Legion Go Fold, which can be used as a laptop or a handheld gaming PC with two different display sizes, as WindowsLatest reports. news.title: Neanderthals seemed to have a thing for modern human women

news.title: This AI Agent Is Designed to Not Go Rogue
news.summary: The new open source project IronCurtain uses a unique method to secure and constrain AI assistant agents before they flip your digital life upside down.

news.title: How Chinese AI Chatbots Censor Themselves
news.summary: Researchers from Stanford and Princeton found that Chinese AI models are more likely than their Western counterparts to dodge political questions or deliver inaccurate answers.
